description: Users are experiencing intermittent issues with updating or canceling calendar items in the Outlook desktop client, referenced by the issue ID ex800425. This problem can significantly affect productivity, as users may receive errors that inhibit the completion of necessary scheduling actions. The issue is noted to have started causing service degradation on June 10, 2024, and it has been linked to Microsoft's Exchange Online services. Although a fix has been deployed to prevent new conflicts, it does not resolve pre-existing conflicting or duplicate calendar items. Therefore, users experiencing ongoing difficulties may need to refer to support articles for specific workarounds.
